text:
@maddow Covid-19 is just a liberal hoax meant to discredit our boy Trump.
    
With Trumpy in charge we have nothing to worry about, right?

     Are you and  #GOP  going to the party next week at Mar-a-Covid?

     I hear it will be a killer.
